BOAT.title: Boat
BOAT.description: Allows travel over water, without getting wet in the process. Also allows carriages to travel over water.

BRIDGE.title: Bridge
BRIDGE.description: Allows travel over water, without getting wet in the process. Also allows carriages to travel over water.

HOUSE.title: Large House
HOUSE.description: A basic house. Permits 4 people to live in it.

PATH.title: Dirt Path
PATH.description: A dirt path, this allows faster travel and buildings can be placed at it's sides.
